verses.roman:
atha śūra-suto rājan
putrayoḥ samakārayat
purodhasā brāhmaṇaiś ca
yathāvad dvija-saṁskṛtim

synonyms: atha—then; śūra-sutaḥ—the son of Śūrasena (Vasudeva); rājan—O King (Parīkṣit); putrayoḥ—of his two sons; samakārayat—had performed; purodhasā—by a priest; brāhmaṇaiḥ—by brāhmaṇas; ca—and; yathā-vat—properly; dvija-saṁskṛtim—brahminical initiation.
translation: My dear King, then Vasudeva, the son of Śūrasena, arranged for a priest and other brāhmaṇas to perform his two sons' second-birth initiation.
